FuncDef: This command is used in ingress and egress queue-group templates to create, modify, or delete a policer.

ParaDef.Info: The policer-id must be specified when executing the policer command. If the specified ID already exists, the system enters that policer's context to allow the policer s parameters to be modified. If the ID does not exist and is within the allowed range for the QoS policy type, a context for the policer ID will be created (depending on the system's current create keyword requirements, which may require the create keyword to actually add the new policer ID to the QoS policy) and the system enters that new policer s context for possible parameter modification. Values-1 to 32.
